title: Large-Scale Machine Learning-Based Language Analysis for Scientific Problem-Solving Pattern Classification

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Machine Learning Concepts and Scientific Writing Proficiency
context.additional_context: Language analysis course aimed at cultivating the ability to automatically classify problem-solving patterns in scientific texts. Conducted in a microlearning format in mobile environments, with project-based assessments using real academic datasets

learning_goals: Can classify problem sentences and non-problem sentences with over 85% accuracy
Can classify solution sentences and non-solution sentences with over 80% accuracy
Can build a scientific text pattern analysis pipeline using machine learning and neural network models
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
